ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: MY GOD... a blatant nerf, no two ways about it.  I mean all other class armor has spell effects, why are we the only class that has less ac then we should? and
ygData.messageBody:
MY GOD...

a blatant nerf, no two ways about it. I mean all other class armor has
spell effects, why are we the only class that has less ac then we should?

and summon water spell is going to compensate me for missing 3-4-5 ac per
piece?

This is blood murder I tell ya! Outrage stuff!
----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: EQBards <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 7:22 PM
Subject: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
